    • Constructor Detail

      • UserDatagramProtocol

        public UserDatagramProtocol(AttackPattern attackPattern,
                            java.lang.String masterAddress,
                            int masterPort)
        The User datagram protocol object constructor. It receives a attackPattern, master server IP address and master server connection port integer value and sends these parameters to User datagram protocol interface super class.
        Parameters:
        attackPattern - A attack pattern object with all information about DDOS operation.
        masterAddress - A master server IP text address.
        masterPort - A master server connection port integer value.

        Specified by:
        writeMessage in class Protocol
        Parameters:
        message - A text string message that will be sended by this protocol.
